content: lion brand pattern # 70225ad corrections applied *pdf modified april 07 2009* skill level easy level 2 size baby child small medium large finished foot length 3-3/4 4-3/4 5-3/4 6-3/4 in 9 5 12 14 5 17 cm vanna s choice® article #860 1 ball crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers bootie is crocheted in one piece first the sole beginning at the heel then the sides of the booties the top of the foot and then the cuff worked in row and rounds adult version adult booties #70226ad 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/adult-booties-70226ad
